#summary Quick tips to customize and use the Flickr Photo Album plugin

= Code Snippets =

== Photo Stream ==

This code block retrieves your 40 most recent photos, randomizes the order, and then displays 20 photos. Note that each photo links to "/photos/", and will probably have to be updated to reflect your own settings.

{{{
<?php
require_once(dirname(__FILE__).'/../../plugins/silaspartners/flickr/class-public.php');
$SilasFlickrPlugin =& new SilasFlickrPlugin();
$photos = $SilasFlickrPlugin->getRecentPhotos('', 0, 40);
shuffle($photos);
?>
<?php foreach (array_slice($photos, 0, 20) as $photo):?>
<a href="/photos/photo/<?php echo $photo['id'];?>/<?php echo $photo['pagename'];?>" class="photo"><img src="<?php echo $photo['sizes']['Square']['source'];?>" width="38" height="38" /></a>
<?php endforeach;?>
}}}
